column4: Anyone have a recomendation for a good terminal replacement (aside xtemr)?
GNOME terminal seems fine, bash seems fine. Anything more specific you'd like to ask?
Yeah.. refer to my meta key question ^^
what do you want to accomplish?
When I press Alt+Left or Alt+Right to change between chans it says "3D" and "3C" instead of changing to different chans .. What do I need to change in Ubuntu's terminal to fix this?
chans? I use the terminal quite a bit, but I'm unsure what you mean...
Then I assume you don't know what irssi is
You can still help if you know how to make gnome-terminal send a 'meta' key when I use Alt+Key combinations
you're in BSD? Well, should be sh, the original Bourne Shell, or Kornshell? I think just sh.
try bash --version, that would tell you if bash is there.
I guess my 98% assurity was pretty accurate
? I thout you said you weren't using bash now and wonder what you _were_ using?
You are probably read my "It's not bash" statement.. which I cleared up in my next message
